comment: An exceptional class with detailed instructions. The instructor was very attentive to everyone's needs. Highly recommended!
The class was well-structured and engaging. I appreciated the focus on both physical and mental aspects of yoga.
Absolutely fantastic! The instructor's energy and expertise made each session enjoyable and transformative. I look forward to every class!
Good class with clear instructions. However, I felt the pace was a bit too fast at times. Overall, a solid experience.
The best yoga class I've attended! The instructor's passion for yoga shines through, and the class environment is very welcoming.
